episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4001_1001:
We’ll be holding a new Neo Champion Stadium
here on Pasio!

This competition is for finding Pasio’s Neo
Champions—sync pairs who can be role models
for others to measure up against.
This time, the main judge will be...
Me! Iris, Champion of the Unova region!

I’ll go ahead and start explaining the judging
criteria for this tournament!

This time, I wanna see sync pairs who have the
power to touch the hearts of others!

Show me that you can lead your fellow sync pairs
on Pasio to new heights by touching their hearts!

I wanna see the powerful bonds of sync pairs who
can do that!

That said, I figure it’s hard to determine on your
own if you have this power to touch the hearts
of others...

So this time, to enter the tournament, you’ll need
to be nominated by other Trainers!

Plus, in order to keep the judging fair, I’ve called
in an assistant to help me!

If we’re requiring nominations, it’s possible that
an organization could rally behind their leader to
nominate them!

However, that’s not representative of the power
to touch the hearts of others using the bonds
you’ve built with people and Pokémon!

To address that concern, we’ll use my Colress
Machine to add an unbiased assessment to
the judging!

The competition will be a simple tournament with
one-on-one battles!

Go ahead and start submitting your nominations
of Trainers you think might be a good fit!
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4002_1001:
You all want to nominate ME to be
Neo Champion?
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/6001_1031:
I’m gonna become a
Champion who can protect
everyone!
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/6001_1001:
Anytime, anywhere, I’m gonna help those who
need it!
That’s the kind of Neo Champion I’m aiming to be!
Er... Maybe I’m trying too hard to sound cool.
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4003_1001:
This is a huge opportunity—you need to be
nominated to participate in the Neo Champion
Stadium this time around...
But...why me?
Well, N felt strongly that it should be you.

You battled beside us when Ghetsis arrived on
Pasio, Nate...
You got angry and shed tears for my sake...
Your honest emotions really touched my heart.

And I know how good you are at battling! Plus,
you’ve got the guts to keep going no matter what
happens!

When we infiltrated Team Plasma’s hideout, we
were able to get through it because of your
quick thinking!

You know how to calmly and thoroughly assess
what’s going on around you.
It means a lot to hear you all say that...
but what about Rosa and Hugh?

They’re talented and worthy of being Neo
Champions, too!

I heard Rosa is busy with something that requires
her attention.
Hugh is helping her, apparently.
But even if they didn’t have that going on...

it doesn’t change the fact that you’re the one I
want to nominate, Nate.
Even Haxorus agrees with me.

He says he wants to be a Neo Champion
with you.
Haxorus...

So, what do you think? Will you accept
our nomination?
OK, I’ll take on the Neo Champion Stadium!
I won’t let you or the others down, N!
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4004_1001: You like the soil around here, huh?
Go ahead and lick up some minerals, then!

Back when we met in Unova, I never even
dreamed that we’d become a sync pair.

You were pretty mad at me back then because I
accidentally set foot in your territory...
We are out of service today. It is a shame.

I recognize those voices! You’re the
Subway Bosses...
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4005_1001:
That’s right—this is the spot that was turned into
a battling area that uses a trolley...

So we’re in the battle facility that the Subway
Bosses made!
Nate! Thank you for coming all the way here!

Unfortunately, we are repairing a few things, so
we’re currently out of service.

When Team Break was on the loose, they broke
part of our facility.
So that’s why nobody was here, huh.
You know what? I’ll help you with those repairs!

But I thought you were planning to participate in
the Neo Champion Stadium, Nate...
Aren’t you too busy?
Not at all!

Besides, if the repairs take too long, everyone
eagerly waiting for you to reopen will be sad!
It looks great!
What do ya think you’re doin’ here?
Oh, Clay!
We’re restoring the cave here that collapsed!
I see that.

But shouldn’t you be preppin’ for the Neo
Champion Stadium?

If ya keep stoppin’ to help everyone on the way,
ya might forget whatcha gotta do, y’know?
But...

I’d feel worse if I didn’t help someone who
needed it!

Anyway, I should get going now. I’ll be
back soon!
Cheeky kid!
Clay, look at this!
We completed our repairs ahead of schedule!
It was so easy to work with Nate!

Our combination worked so well! It’s like he was
reading our minds!
I saw that, yeah.
But I don’t think I’d call that mind-readin’.

I think he’s just good at pickin’ up on what others
are feelin’ and basin’ what he’s gonna say or do
on that.

I see why there’s folks out there who’ve
recognized his talent.
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4006_1001: Phew... Today’s training was rough, too...
Marlon?! Why’d you come out of a glacier?!

I was swimmin’ with the Pokémon, and it felt real
good, so I kept goin’ and goin’—and that’s how I
ended up here!
What about you?

We’re training for the upcoming Neo Champion
Stadium.
Huh. Didn’t realize a tournament like that existed...

When the ocean’s your home, you don’t worry
about that sort of thing!

(That’s right. Rosa did mention that back in Unova,
Marlon didn’t really know what was going on with
Team Plasma...)

(He really is a laid-back guy, just like the
rumors say...)
Oh! I just remembered!

I heard you battled Team Plasma when they were
going wild here on Pasio. Props, dude!
I just did what I could.
Also...

I hate you. I’ll never forget what you did
in Unova.
But you’re still N’s father!

You truly have a kind heart...one that resonates
with others.

You got angry for the people of Unova, you yelled
at Ghetsis for me...
and now, you’re even crying for me...
I know now that not everything is black and white.

But that doesn’t mean I’m just going to stand there
and do nothing!

If someone’s in trouble, I wanna be there for
them, and we can get angry or cry together...

If there’s a wall in their way, I wanna help them
break it down.
That’s the kind of Champion we wanna be!

You’re strong as a gnarly wave and as nice as a
glassy sea.

Whatever the reason, it’s all good. But think ’bout
why you’re doin’ what you do.

The strength of your beliefs is what gives you and
your Pokémon power!
Understood!
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4007_1101: At long last, the Neo Champion Stadium began!

The sync pairs who were nominated based on
their power to touch the hearts of others began a
fierce competition...
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4007_1001:
For the sake of everyone from Hisui who’s
cheering me on...
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4008_1001:
(So this is Rei, the guy who saved the people and
Pokémon of the Hisui region! He’s good!)
Will you trust me and follow my lead?
Hey! They’re really taking a beating!
Is this some sort of strategy, maybe?
(So this is the path you’ve chosen...)

(You get hurt over and over, but keep moving
forward without looking away...)
But knowing you, Nate, I’m confident...

(They’re avoiding hitting us head-on—they keep
moving into our blind spot before they attack.)

(But if we know they’re aiming for our blind spot,
then we can predict where they’ll be!)
episode_event_ch0100_90_kyohei/4009_1001:
All the sync pairs showed us amazing battles that
really touched our hearts!

Among the competitors, there was one pair that
truly put their trust in each other and gave it
their all...

They showed us a strong bond that was so
touching it made our hearts ache!

I’m gonna award Nate the title of Pasio
Neo Champion!

Haxorus appeared to only be defending, but I
measured a significant jump in its power, as well.

The Pokémon trusted its Trainer, and that allowed
their feelings to resonate with each other. The
power that created was explosive!
Together with you, I can go anywhere.

It can be scary at times—overwhelmingly so.
But...
I want to extend my hand...
as a Neo Champion of Pasio!
